Third Act [i](If your life total is less than half of your starting life total or if you have one or fewer cards in hand, you enter the Third Act for the rest of the game.)[/i]
Blue Spectre can't be blocked as long as you're in your third act.
{1}{U}, Discard a card: Exile Blue Spectre. Return it to the battlefield tapped at the beginning of the next end step.
